reviewText: I loved this collagen mask! My skin felt instantly more hydrated, plump, and smooth after just one use. It gave me a healthy glow without feeling sticky or heavy. I loved it so much that I got more to give as Christmas presents to my friends

This comes as a 4 pack amd each pack as a top and bottom mask to cover your whole face. Upon opening a pack. The mask is covered in serum making it a little slippery, but once I got both pieces on my face it stayed in place well. The masks gave an almost cooling effect which felt refreshing. I wore this for 3-4 hours until the mask turned clear as I touched. When I removed the mask my face felt soft and moisturized. This is a great addition to my at home spa days

reviewTitle: Deeply Hydrating & Refreshing, A Must Have Face Mask!
reviewText: I absolutely love this Hydrating Bio Collagen Deep Mask! The mask starts out white and gradually turns clear as it works its magic. I usually wear masks overnight, but I tried this one during the day for about four hours, and my skin felt incredibly hydrated and refreshed.... I absolutely love this Hydrating Bio Collagen Deep Mask! The mask starts out white and gradually turns clear as it works its magic. I usually wear masks overnight, but I tried this one during the day for about four hours, and my skin felt incredibly hydrated and refreshed. It leaves a glossy, plump feeling without any heaviness, and the hydrogel fits comfortably for a spa like experience at home. The formula is gentle, great for most skin types, and the price is excellent. Arrived quickly and makes a perfect gift or stocking stuffer. Truly a must have for glowing, revitalized skin!

reviewTitle: Hydrating/skin plumping/reduces the appearance of lines
reviewText: You get 4 collagen face masks when you order. They are made of gel and they come with a top half mask, a bottom half mask, a lip mask piece and eye mask pieces. They are slippery too so you just have to be careful when you take them out. I used a couple of these... You get 4 collagen face masks when you order. They are made of gel and they come with a top half mask, a bottom half mask, a lip mask piece and eye mask pieces. They are slippery too so you just have to be careful when you take them out. I used a couple of these masks already. I noticed that they added a lot of hydration & they also plumped my skin. The extra hydration reduced the appearance of some of my finer lines. The winter season hasn’t been kind to my skin but these masks are helping!! Overall, these face mask really seem to be making a different. I recommend these masks if you have really dry skin or mature skin.

These Hydrating Bio-Collagen Deep Masks are excellent quality. This was my first time using a two-piece mask and I never want to go back to the single sheet masks. The mask itself feels very cooling and moisturizing.  It’s like a luxurious spa-like experience. This set of four masks is definitely a good value for the price.

It also helped calm my skin and made my pores look a little smoother. Overall, it’s a nice mask if you want something gentle, hydrating, and easy to use.

reviewTitle: The mask has a great feel on the skin and delivers excellent results
reviewText: I’m really impressed with this product! The mask has a great feel on the skin and delivers excellent results. After using it, my skin feels smoother, more hydrated, and refreshed. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a quality collagen mask
